name: Pum-Color-Plux
description:
PUM-COLOR-PLUX

"¡Pum!" -Shoot the platforms

"¡Plux!" - Your character's color changes

The color-based platform game.

In order to make it to the top, you and the platforms you jump through have to be of the same color. Shoot the platforms to change their colors!

Currently, two levels of the game are available

-Pum-Color-Plux is the first game created by the creators during an online-jam
